Lannister.name: Tywin Lannister, The Great Lion
Lannister.descriptions:
Once per game, at the start of any Turn, target any number of enemy Combat Units:
• 1 of those enemies becomes Panicked.
• 1 of those enemies becomes Vulnerable.
• 1 of those enemies suffers 4 Hits.
• 1 of those enemies suffers 1 Panic Test.
• 1 of those enemies loses all Abilities until the end of the Round.
*(The same Combat Unit may be targeted by multiple effects)*
Lannister.quote: "Some battles are won with swords and spears, others with quills and ravens."

Lannister.name: Pycelle, Grand Maester
Lannister.descriptions: Each time Pycelle Claims a zone, target 1 enemy Combat Unit. They become **Weakened**.
Lannister.quote: "Pycelle is a toad. But better a Lannister toad then a Tyrell toad, no?" -Tyrion Lannister

Lannister.name: The High Sparrow, Father of the Faithful
Lannister.descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a Tactics Zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*: 
While Influencing an enemy, each time that enemy suffers Wounds from failing Panic Tests, target 1 friendly unit in Long Range. They restore that many Wounds, up to 3.
Lannister.quote: "I seldom feel so close to god as when I am being whipped for mine own wickedness..."

Lannister.name: Tyrion Lannister, The Imp
Lannister.descriptions:
Your maximum Tactics Hand size is increased by +1. You start the game with 4 cards and may draw up to 4 cards when re-filling your hand.
Once per game, when an opponent plays a Tactics card, before resolving that card, you may search your Tactics deck or discard pile for 1 **Counterplot** card and play it. Shuffle your Tactics deck.
Lannister.quote: "He is a bigger man than he seems, I think."

Lannister.name: Cersei Lannister, Queen Regent
Lannister.descriptions:
Cersei begins the game with 2 Order tokens. 
Each time Cersei Claims a zone, you may remove 1 Order token from her.
If you do, perform the following: 
If you Control [CROWN], search your Tactics deck or discard pile for 1 **Hear Me Roar!** card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your Tactics deck.
If you Control [MONEY], search your Tactics deck or discard pile for 1 **Subjugation of Power** card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your Tactics deck.
Lannister.quote: "When you play the game of thrones, you win or you die. There is no middle ground."

Lannister.name: Joffrey Baratheon, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms
Lannister.descriptions:
While Joffrey is on the Tactics Board, you count as Controlling [CROWN].
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
While lnfluencing an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 Wound from failing Panic Tests.
Lannister.quote: "His Grace has a unique way of winning the hearts of his subjects."

Lannister.name: Kevan Lannister, Master Of Law
Lannister.descriptions:
Once per game, at the start of any Turn, target any number of friendly Combat Units:
• 1 of those units restores 2 Wounds.
• 1 of those units removes all Condition tokens.
• 1 of those units performs a 2" shift.
Until the end of the Round, 1 of those units Attacks using its highest Attack Die Value, and may re-roll any Attack Dice.
*(The same Combat Unit may be targeted by multiple effects)*
Lannister.quote: "The gods shaped him to be a follower, not a leader." -Tyrion Lannister

Lannister.name: Qyburn, Master Of Whisperers
Lannister.descriptions:
Qyburn begins the game with 4 Order tokens.
Each time an enemy NCU Claims a zone, before resolving that zone's effect, you may remove 1 Order token from Qyburn. If you do, gain the following based on that zone:
[CROWN]: 1 enemy becomes **Panicked**.
[MONEY]: 1 enemy Combat Unit suffers 1 Wound.
[SWORDS]: Attacker counts as having -1 rank for Attack Dice.
[LETTER]: Opponent draws 1 fewer Tactics Card.
[HORSE]: Enemy moves with -1 [MOVEMENT].
Lannister.restrictions: *May not be fielded in an army that includes Varys.*

Lannister.name: Tommen Baratheon, Next in Succession
Lannister.descriptions:
Tommen begins the game with 2 Order tokens.
Each time Tommen Claims a zone, you may remove 1 Order token from him. If you do, perform the following:
If you Control [CROWN], search your Tactics deck or discard pile for 1 **Fealty to the Crown** card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your Tactics deck.
If you Control [MONEY], search your Tactics deck or discard pile for 1 **Bribery** card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your Tactics deck.
Lannister.quote: "When I'm king in my own right, I'm going to outlaw beets."

Stark.name: Catelyn Stark, Lady of Winterfell
Stark.descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
Each time Catelyn Influences a unit, remove 1 Condition token from them.
While lnfluencing a unit, that unit Attacks using its highest Attack Die Value.
Stark.quote: "Show me the path I must walk and do not let me stumble in the dark places that lie ahead."

Stark.name: Sansa Stark, Little Bird
Stark.descriptions:
Once per game, when Sansa Activates, you may return 1 Tactics card from your discard pile to your hand.
Each time Sansa Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Return 1 Tactics card from your discard pile to your hand.*
Stark.quote: "The Hound is right ... I am only a little bird, repeating the words they taught me."

Stark.name: Eddard Stark, Warden of the North
Stark.names: Bravery in the Face of Death
Stark.descriptions:
Eddard begins the game with 4 Order tokens on him.
Each time a friendly unit is performing a Panic Test, after rolling dice, you may remove 1 Order token from Eddard. If you do, that unit may re-roll any dice for this test.
Each time a friendly unit passes a Panic Test, you may remove 1 Order token from Eddard. If you do, that unit restores 2 Wounds, +1 Wound for each of its destroyed ranks.
Stark.quote:
"You wear your honor like a suit of armor, Stark."
-Petyr Baelish

Stark.name: Rodrik Cassel, Combat Veteran
Stark.descriptions:
Each time Rodrik Claims [SWORDS], target 1 enemy Combat Unit. They become Vulnerable.
Rodrik begins the game with 2 Order tokens on him.
At the start of any Turn, you may remove 1 Order token from Rodrik. If you do, remove 1 Order token from 1 friendly unit. That Order may be used again this Round.
Stark.quote: "There is no better trainer than Rodrik."

Stark.name: Arya Stark, The Wolf Girl
Stark.descriptions: Arya begins the game with 2 Order tokens on her. At the start of an enemy Turn, you may remove 1 Order token from Arya. If you do, target 1 friendly lnfantry unit. lt performs 1 Maneuver or Retreat Action.
Stark.quote:
"Boy, girl, you are a sword, that is all." 
-Syrio Forel

Stark.name: Howland Reed, Protector of the Neck
Stark.descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
While Influencing an enemy unit, that enemy's Attacks suffer -1 to Hit and they treat all Terrain as having the Hindering and Rough keywords.
Stark.quote: "He could talk to trees and weave words and make castles appear and disappear."

Stark.name: Eddard Stark, Hand of The King
Stark.descriptions:
At the start of any Turn, you may destroy Eddard. If you do, target 1 enemy NCU. That NCU cannot Activate and loses all Abilities until the end of the Round. /
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat  Unit until the end of the Round)*:
While Influencing a unit, each time that unit is targeted by an NCU Ability or Tactics Zone, you may cancel the effect of that NCU or zone.
Stark.quote: "I have met so few of them in my life... When I see what honesty and honor have won you, I understand why..." -Varys

Stark.name: Lyanna Mormont, Youngest She-Bear
Stark.descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
While Influencing a friendly unit, it gains the following based on the number of destroyed friendly Combat Units *(effects are cumulative)*:
**0+:** Unit gains +1 to Morale Test rolls.
**1+:** Melee Attacks gain **Critical Blow**.
**2+:** Automatically passes all Panic Tests.
**3+:** May re-roll any Attack Dice.
Stark.quote: "Bear Island knows no king but the King in the North, whose name is STARK."

Stark.name: Robb Stark, King in the North
Stark.descriptions:
After deployment, target 1 friendly Combat Unit. Remove it from the battlefield, placing it off the table *(in Reserve)*. Once per game, when Robb Claims [HORSE], you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Deploy the unit Robb placed in Reserve fully in Short Range of any Flank table edge and attach this card to them until the end of the game. While attached, enemies that unit Successfully Charges in the Flank or Rear become **Panicked** and **Vulnerable**.*
Stark.quote: "I thought the battles  would be the hard part..."
Stark.restrictions: *Your army may not include Eddard Stark.*

Free Folk.name: Lady Val, The Wildling Princess
Free Folk.descriptions:
Each time Lady Val Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*1 friendly Combat Unit performs 1 Manuever or Retreat Action. If they Retreat, 1 enemy they disengage from becomes **Vulnerable**.*
Free Folk.quote: "I know the forest better than all your black-cloaked rangers. It holds no ghosts for me."

Free Folk.name: Mance Rayder, Artful Tactician
Free Folk.descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
While Influencing a unit, each time that unit is targeted by a Tactics Zone, before resolving that zone's effect, you may draw 1 Tactics card.
Free Folk.quote: "Mance has cunning. He was raised a crow, you know, and the crow's a tricksy bird."

Free Folk.name: Craster, Ally of Convenience
Free Folk.descriptions:
Once per game, at the start of any Turn, you may restore 2 Wounds to 1 friendly unit.
Each time Craster Claims a zone, you may replace its effect with:
*Draw 1 Tactics card and restore 2 Wounds to 1 friendly Combat Unit.*
Free Folk.quote: "He's never turned a ranger away from his fire, nor does he love Mance Rayder..."

Free Folk.name: Styr, Iron-Fisted Tyrant
Free Folk.descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the round)*:
While Influencing a friendly unit, that unit's Melee Attacks gain +1 Attack Die and **Sundering**.
Free Folk.quote: "These are wildlings... more beast than man."

Free Folk.name: Ygritte, Kissed by Fire
Free Folk.descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the round)*:
While Influencing a friendly unit, that unit gains +1 [MOVEMENT] and ignores the Hindering and Rough keywords.
While Influencing an enemy unit, that enemy suffers -1 [MOVEMENT] and triggers Disorderly Charges on rolls of 1 or 2.
Free Folk.quote: "I know one thing. I know that you are wildling to the bone" -Jon Snow

Free Folk.name: Lady Dalla, Wife and Council
Free Folk.descriptions:
Each time Dalla Claims a zone, perform the following based on the zone she Claimed:
[CROWN]: 1 enemy becomes Weakened.
[MONEY]: Instead of removing a Condition token, target 1 enemy engaged with that unit. They suffer 1 Hit, +1 Hit for each remaining rank in this unit.
[LETTER]: Instead of drawing cards, look at the top 2 cards of your opponent's Tactics deck. You may discard one of those cards. Then, place the remaining cards on the top of the Tactics deck.
Free Folk.quote: "We free folk know things you kneelers have forgotten. Sometimes the short road is not the safest, Jon Snow."

Free Folk.name: Mance Rayder, Deceptive Bard
Free Folk.descriptions:
Once per game, when an enemy NCU Activates, that NCU loses all Abilities until the end of the Round. /
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
While Influencing an enemy unit, your opponent may not target that unit with Tactics Zone effects or Influence Abilities.
Free Folk.quote: "The Wall can stop an army, but not a man alone."

Free Folk.name: Jon Snow, Turncloak Crow
Free Folk.descriptions: Once per game, at the start of any Round, you may search your Tactics deck or discard pile for one **Coordination Tactics** or **Regroup and Reform** Tactics card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your Tactics deck.
Free Folk.quote: "Mance Rayder swore an oath as well..."

Neutral.name: Petyr Baelish, Littlefinger
Neutral.descriptions:
Each time Petyr Claims a zone, you may replace its effect with the effect of any unclaimed zone.
Once per game, at the start of any Turn, you may select 1 zone. Until the end of the Round, you count as Controlling that zone.
Neutral.quote: "In King's Landing, there are two sorts of people. The players and the pieces."

Neutral.name: Lord Varys, The Spider
Neutral.descriptions:
Varys begins the game with 4 Order tokens. 
Each time an enemy NCU Claims a zone, after resolving that zone's effect, you may remove 1 Order token from Varys. If you do, gain the following based on that zone:
[CROWN]: 1 enemy suffers 1 Panic Test. 
[MONEY]: Restore 2 Wounds to 1 friendly unit.
[SWORDS]: 1 enemy suffers 3 Hits.
[LETTER]: Draw 1 Tactics card.
[HORSE]: 1 friendly unit shifts 3".
Neutral.quote: "Varys has ways of learning things that no man could know."

Neutral.name: The High Seneschal
Neutral.names: History is Written by the Victors
Neutral.descriptions:
**The High Seneschal cannot activate and cannot be targeted in any way. He merely observes the battle.**
Once the victor has been determined, that player may define all actions and events that transpired throughout the game. No opponent may refute or deny any retelling of said events *(regardless of how unlikely or exaggerated)* until such a time where they best the victor in a new game.
Neutral.quote: "He is the keeper of this world's history."

Neutral.name: Jaqen H'ghar, Follower of The Red God
Neutral.names:
Choosing a Name /
A Name Given
Neutral.descriptions:
Each time Jaqen Activates, he may replace his Influence Ability with the Influence Ability of any friendly or enemy NCU until the end of the Round. /
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
While Influencing a friendly Infantry unit, its Melee Attacks gain **Precision**.
Neutral.quote: "The Red God has his due, sweet girl, and only death may pay for life."

Neutral.name: Tycho Nestoris, Iron Banker
Neutral.descriptions: Once per game, at the start of any Turn, you may restore 5 Wounds *(total)* across any number of friendly Combat Units.
Neutral.quote: "We who serve the Iron Bank face death full as often as you who serve the Iron Throne."

Neutral.name: Walder Frey, Lord of the Crossing
Neutral.descriptions:
You may only Activate Walder if you have no other units that can Activate this Round.
Each time Walder Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with the effect of any zone. If Walder Claims [CROWN], you may replace that zone's effect with:
*1 enemy becomes **Weakened**. 1 friendly unit restores 2 Wounds. At the start of the next Round, you become the First Player.*
Neutral.quote: "He has an old man's caution and a young man's ambition, and has never lacked for cunning."

Neutral.name: Roose Bolton, Calculating and Cruel
Neutral.descriptions:
Roose begins the game with 3 Order tokens. 
Each time Roose Activates, you may remove 1 Order token from him. 
If you do, target 1 enemy Combat Unit. They become **Panicked**.
Each time Roose Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*1 enemy Combat Unit suffers 1 Panic Test.*
Neutral.quote: "You had only to look at Bolton to know that he had more cruelty in his pinky toe than all the Freys combined."

Night's Watch.name: Bowen Marsh, First Steward
Night's Watch.descriptions: Each time Bowen Claims a zone, you may look at the top 2 cards of your Tactics Deck. Place 1 of those cards in your hand and the other on the bottom of your Tactics Deck.

Night's Watch.name: Aemon, Maester of Castle Black
Night's Watch.descriptions: Each time Aemon Claims a zone, you may target 1 friendly Combat Unit. That unit restores 1 Wound, +1 additional Wound for each of its destroyed ranks.
Night's Watch.quote: "Knowledge is a weapon, Jon. Arm yourself well before you ride forth to battle."

Night's Watch.name: Jeor Mormont, The Old Bear
Night's Watch.names: Duty To The Realms Of Men
Night's Watch.descriptions:
Each time Jeor Claims a zone, you may target 2 friendly Night's Watch Combat Units in Long Range of each other. Move 1 friendly attached Tactics card from 1 of those units to the other.
Once per game, when Jeor Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Take 1 Tactics card that can be attached to a unit from your discard pile and attach it to a friendly Night's Watch unit.*
Night's Watch.quote: "The Wall was made to guard the realms of men... and not against other men"

Night's Watch.name: Qhorin Halfhand, Unwavering Ranger
Night's Watch.names:
Sacrifice For The Cause / 
Halfhand's Guidance
Night's Watch.descriptions:
At the start of any Turn, if Qhorin is not on the Tactics Board, you may destroy him. If you do, target 1 enemy unit. That enemy cannot Activate or perform Actions this Round. /
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the round)*:
While Influencing a friendly Cavalry or Infantry unit, it gains +1 [MOVEMENT] and +1 Attack Die.
Night's Watch.quote: "Our honor means no more than our lives, so long as the realm is safe."

Night's Watch.name: Donal Noye, Expert Blacksmith
Night's Watch.descriptions:
Donal begins the game with 2 Order Tokens on him.
Each time a unit is performing an Attack, after rolling Attack Dice, you may remove 1 Order Token from Donal. If you do, choose 1:
• Attacker may re-roll any Attack Dice and opponents cannot expend **Weakened** tokens from them.
• Defender gains +1 to Defense Dice rolls and opponents cannot expend **Vulnerable** tokens from them.
Night's Watch.quote: "The Watch is not what it was. Too few honest men to keep the rogues in line."

Night's Watch.name: Othell Yarwyck, Warmachine Specialist
Night's Watch.descriptions:
Each time Othell Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Make the following Ranged Attack on 1 enemy Combat Unit:*
[ATTACK:Ranged:Ranged Volley:3+3]
*Gains +1 Attack Die for each of the Defenders remaining ranks and the following based on the zone Othell Claimed:*
[CROWN]: **Vicious** [MONEY]: **Sundering**
[SWORDS]: Defender becomes **Weakened**
Night's Watch.quote: "This will show them how we deal with their kind."

Night's Watch.name: Samwell Tarley, Craven Scholar
Night's Watch.descriptions: Increase your Tactics Hand Size limit by +1. You start the game with 4 cards and may draw up to 4 cards when refilling your hand.
Night's Watch.quote:
"I can't command you to be brave, but I can
command you to hide your fears." -Jon Snow

Night's Watch.name: Gilly, The Wildling Girl
Night's Watch.descriptions: Gilly may only be Activated once per game.
Night's Watch.restrictions: *May only be fielded in an army including **Samwell Tarley, Craven Scholar**.*

Night's Watch.name: Craster, Ally of the Watch
Night's Watch.descriptions:
When Craster Claims the following zones, their effects gains:
[MONEY]: *Instead of restoring Wounds from 1 unit, you may restore 3 Wounds (total) across any number of friendly Combat Units.*
[SWORDS]: *The targeted unit counts as having +1 remaining rank for determining Attack Dice.*
[HORSE]: *The targeted unit moves with +1 [MOVEMENT].*
Night's Watch.quote:
"The man's half-mad, I won't deny
it, but you'd be the same if you'd spent
your life in this cursed wood."

Night's Watch.name: Yoren, Wandering Crow
Night's Watch.descriptions:
Each time Yoren Claims a zone, before resolving that zone's effect, place 1 Order token on him.
Each time Yoren Claims [CROWN], you may replace that zone's effect with: 
*Place 1 Order token on Yoren.*
Each time Yoren Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Remove 4 Order tokens from Yoren.*
*If you do, Deploy 1 Conscripts unit fully within Long Range of a friendly Table Edge.*
Night's Watch.quote: "I'm here to find men for the Wall..."

Night's Watch.name: Ser Denys Mallister, Honorable Brother
Night's Watch.descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
While Influencing a friendly unit, if that unit began the Turn engaged, each time it performs a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice, choose 1. If this unit has only 1 remaining rank, gain both instead:
• This unit rolls its highest Attack Die Value.
• 1 enemy engaged with this unit gains 1 Condition token.
Night's Watch.quote: "The men of the Night's Watch dressed in black, Ser Denys Mallister reminded me sternly, as if I had forgotten." -Mance Rayder

Baratheon.name: Alester Florent, Lord of Brightwater
Baratheon.descriptions:
Alester begins the game with 3 Order tokens on him.
Each time Alester Claims a zone, after resolving that zone's effect, you may remove 1 Order Token from him. If you do, move him to any empty zone, or switch zones with any other NCU.
Baratheon.quote: "...a man who changes kings and gods the way I change my boots." -Cortnay Penrose

Baratheon.name: Shyra Errol, Lady of Haystack Hall
Baratheon.descriptions:
Each time Shyra Claims [CROWN], restore 1 Wound to 1 friendly Combat Unit.
Each time Shyra Claims [LETTER], remove 1 Condition Token from 1 friendly Combat Unit.
Each time Shyra Claims [MONEY], if you remove a token, place 1 Condition Token of that type on 1 enemy Combat Unit.
Baratheon.quote: "Sworn to House Baratheon... First Renly, then Stannis."

Baratheon.name: Melisandre, The Red Woman
Baratheon.names:
Sacrifice To The Lord Of Light /
Loyalty: Stannis Baratheon
Baratheon.descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
When Melisandre Influences a friendly unit, you may have them suffer 2 Wounds and 1 Panic Test. If you do, target 1 enemy Combat Unit. That enemy suffers 1 Panic Test with -2 to their roll and +2 Wounds on failure.
While Influencing a friendly unit, that unit is a R'hllor unit and its Melee Attacks gain **Vicious**.
Baratheon.quote: "Lady Melisandre wore no crown, but every man there knew that she was Stannis Baratheon’s real queen."
Baratheon.restrictions:
Loyalty: **STANNIS BARATHEON**
*Your army may never include Units or Attachments with different Loyalties.*

Baratheon.name: Davos Seaworth, Hand of The True King
Baratheon.descriptions:
Davos begins the game with 3 Order tokens on him.
Each time a friendly unit Charges, after rolling Charge Distance Dice, you may remove 1 token from Davos. If you do, you may re-roll any Charge Distance Dice.
Each time a friendly unit Activates, you may remove 1 token from Davos. If you do, until the end of the Turn, enemies engaged with that unit may not use Orders or be the target of friendly Tactics cards.
Baratheon.restrictions:
Loyalty: **STANNIS BARATHEON**
*Your army may never include Units or Attachments with different Loyalties.*

Baratheon.name: Selyse & Shireen, Queen and Princess
Baratheon.names:
Fervent Conviction /
Necessary Sacrifices /
Loyalty: Stannis Baratheon
Baratheon.descriptions:
***Influence** (When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
While Influencing a unit, it gains +1 to Morale Test rolls and, each time it passes a Morale test, 1 enemy it is engaged with suffers 1 Wound. /
Once per game, when a friendly Combat Unit would be destroyed, instead, that unit is not destroyed and remains in play with D3 Wounds. Until the end of the game, it is a R'hllor unit.
Baratheon.quote: "The red woman had won her, heart and soul, turning her from the gods of the Seven Kingdoms."
Baratheon.restrictions:
Loyalty: **STANNIS BARATHEON**
*Your army may never include Units or Attachments with different Loyalties.*

Baratheon.name: Axell Florent, Hand of the Queen
Baratheon.names:
In R'hllor's Name /
Loyalty: Stannis Baratheon
Baratheon.descriptions:
***Influence** (When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
While Influencing an enemy unit, each time they fail a Panic Test, they become **Weakened**.
While Influencing an enemy unit, if they are engaged with a R'hllor unit, they suffer +1 Wound from failing Panic Tests.
Baratheon.quote: "If you are truly the Queen's Hand, I pity her Grace." -Jon Snow
Baratheon.restrictions:
Loyalty: **STANNIS BARATHEON**
*Your army may never include Units or Attachments with different Loyalties.*

Baratheon.name: Margaery Tyrell, Little Rose
Baratheon.names:
A Rose and its Thorns /
Loyalty: Renly Baratheon
Baratheon.descriptions: Each time Margaery Claims a zone, you may target 1 friendly Combat Unit. They restore 1 Wound. You may then target 1 enemy engaged with that unit. They become **Vulnerable**.
Baratheon.quote: "The girl is a maid of fourteen, sweet and beautiful and tractable." -Varys
Baratheon.restrictions:
Loyalty: **RENLY BARATHEON**
*Your army may never include Units or Attachments with different Loyalties.*

Baratheon.name: Olenna Tyrell, Queen of Thorns
Baratheon.descriptions:
Each time Olenna Claims a zone, target 1 enemy NCU and choose 1:
• That NCU loses all Abilities until the end of the Round.
• If that NCU Claims a zone this Round, before resolving that zone's effect, target 1 enemy Combat Unit. They suffer D3 Hits and becomes **Weakened**.
Baratheon.quote: "All men are fools, if truth be told, but the ones in motley are more amusing than the ones in crowns."
Baratheon.restrictions:
Loyalty: **RENLY BARATHEON**
*Your army may never include Units or Attachments with different Loyalties.*

Baratheon.name: Eldon Estermont, Venerable Knight
Baratheon.descriptions:
Each time Eldon Claims a zone, you may replace that Zone's effect with: 
*Draw 3 Tactics Cards, then shuffle 1 card from your hand into your Tactics Deck.*
Baratheon.quote: "An old knight, nearing seventy, he is the Lord of Greenstone"
Baratheon.restrictions:
Loyalty: **RENLY BARATHEON**
*Your army may never include Units or Attachments with different Loyalties.*

Baratheon.name: Cortnay Penrose, Reliable Castellan
Baratheon.descriptions:
Cortnay begins the game with 3 Order tokens on him.
Each time an enemy NCU activates, you may remove 1 Order token from Cortnay. If you do, choose 2 zones. If that NCU Claims either zone this Turn, before resolving that zone's effect, target any number of friendly Combat Units. Restore D3+2 Wounds *(total)* across these units.
Baratheon.quote: "Is it the justice of your cause you doubt, my lord, or the strength of your arm?"
Baratheon.restrictions:
Loyalty: **RENLY BARATHEON**
*Your army may never include Units or Attachments with different Loyalties.*

Targaryen.name: Daenerys Targaryen, Khaleesi
Targaryen.descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit claims a Tactics Zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the round)*:
Each time Daenerys Influences a unit, remove 1 Condition token from them.
While Influencing a unit, that unit's Melee Attacks may re-roll any Attack Dice.
Targaryen.quote: "My sun-and-stars made a queen of me, but if he had been a different man, it might have been much otherwise."

Targaryen.name: Illyrio Mopatis, Magister of Pentos
Targaryen.descriptions:
Each time lllyrio Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Target 1 friendly Combat Unit. They restore 3 Wounds. 1 enemy they are engaged with becomes **Weakened**.*
Targaryen.quote: "You Westerosi are all the same. You sew some beast upon a scrap of silk, and suddenly you are all lions or dragons or eagles."

Targaryen.name: Pyat Pree, Warlock of Qarth
Targaryen.descriptions:
Place the **House of the Undying** Tactics zone card next to the Tactics Board at the start of the game. It acts as an additional Tactics zone for all purposes. 
Each time a friendly NCU Claims the [UNDYING] zone, you may replace that zone's effect with: 
*Your opponent must reveal 1 Tactics card at random from their hand. You may have them discard that card or return it to their hand. If you return it to their hand, they must then randomly discard 1 Tactics card.*
Targaryen.quote: "Come with me to the House of the Undying, and you shall drink of truth and wisdom."

Targaryen.name: Barristan Selmy, Advisor to the Dragon
Targaryen.descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the round)*:
While Influencing a unit, each time that unit is targeted by an enemy Ability or Tactics card, you may remove this card from that unit to cancel the effect of that Ability or Tactics card.
Targaryen.quote: "Men can always ﬁght, Your Grace. Ask rather if we can win."

Targaryen.name: Xaro Xhoan Daxos, Merchant Prince of Qarth
Targaryen.descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the round)*:
While Influencing a unit, that unit suffers/gains the following, based on what zone Xaro Controls:
[CROWN]: This unit suffers +1 Wound from failing Panic Tests.
[MONEY]: After rolling Defense Dice, this unit blocks +1 Hit. 
[LETTER]: Unit's Attacks gain +1 Attack Die.
[UNDYING]: Unit's Attacks suffer -1 Attack Die.
Targaryen.quote: "I no longer lust for dragons. I saw their work at Astapor."

Targaryen.name: Daenerys Targaryen, The Unburnt
Targaryen.descriptions:
Each time Daenerys Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*1 friendly **Drogon**, **Rhaegal**, or **Viserion** unit performs 1 Attack Action.*
Targaryen.quote: "I am blood of the dragon. I am Daenerys Stormborn, Princess of Dragonstone, of the blood and seed of Aegon the Conqueror."
Targaryen.restrictions: *Reduce the cost of 1 **Drogon**, **Rhaegal**, or **Viserion** unit in your army by 1.*

Greyjoy.name: Rodrik Harlaw, The Reader
Greyjoy.descriptions:
Rodrik begins the game with 2 Order Tokens.
At the start of any Turn, you may remove 1 Order token from Rodrik. If you do, place any number of Tactics cards from your hand to the side, then draw 1+ that many cards. Shuffle the cards you set aside into your Tactics Deck.
Greyjoy.quote: "I prefer my history dead. Dead history is writ in ink, the living sort in blood."

Greyjoy.name: Aeron Greyjoy, The Damphair
Greyjoy.descriptions:
**Aeron may only Influence Greyjoy units.**
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
While Influencing a unit, when that unit performs an Action, before resolving that Action, it restores 1 Wound.
When it destroys an enemy with a Melee Attack, it restores 1 Wound for each of its destroyed ranks.
Greyjoy.quote: "What is dead may never die, but rises again, harder and stronger."

Greyjoy.name: Balon Greyjoy, King of Salt and Rock
Greyjoy.descriptions:
Once per game, when Balon Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Redeploy 1 previously destroyed Greyjoy Combat Unit fully within Long Range of a friendly Deployment Edge, or fully within Short Range of any Flank table edge. It deploys Activated and with any Pillage tokens it previously had.*
Greyjoy.quote: "No man has ever died from bending his knee. He who kneels may rise again, blade in hand."

Greyjoy.name: Wendamyr, Maester Of House Greyjoy
Greyjoy.descriptions:
Wendamyr begins the game with 1 Order token.
At the start of a friendly Turn, you may remove 1 Order token from Wendamyr. If you do, choose 1:
• Draw 1 Tactics card and restore 2 Wounds to 1 friendly Combat Unit.
• 1 friendly Combat Unit performs a 3" shift.
When Wendamyr Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Place 1 Order token on Wendamyr.*
Greyjoy.quote: "If you do not have a maester, it is taken to mean that you are of little consequence."

Greyjoy.name: Erik Ironmaker, The Just
Greyjoy.names: Gifts of Iron, Gold, and Steel
Greyjoy.descriptions:
At the start of the game, place 2 Pillage tokens on Erik.
When an enemy NCU Claims [MONEY] place 1 Pillage token on Erik.
When Erik Claims a zone, you may remove 1 Pillage token from him and place it on 1 friendly unit with Pillage.
Greyjoy.quote: "If old is wise, no one is wiser than me. If big is strong, no one's stronger."

Greyjoy.name: Tristifer Botley, Lord of Lordsport
Greyjoy.descriptions:
Once per game, at the start of the Round, you may select 1 Tactics Zone. If you do, that zone may not be Claimed this Round.
Once per game, when an enemy NCU Activates, you may select 2 Tactics Zones. If that NCU Claims either zone this Activation, target 1 enemy Combat Unit. It becomes **Panicked** and **Vulnerable**.
Greyjoy.quote: "Sweet eyes, truly. That was the trouble with poor Tristifer; he was too sweet for the Iron Islands." -Asha Greyjoy

Greyjoy.name: Moqorro, The Black Flame
Greyjoy.descriptions:
Moqorro begins the game with 2 Order tokens on him.
Each time Moqorro Claims a zone, you may remove 1 Order token from him. If you do, look at the top card of any Tactics Deck. You may then shuffle that deck.
Once per game, when Moqorro Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Return 1 previously destroyed friendly Attachment to a friendly Combat Unit, replacing a model as usual but ignoring the usual Attachment limits.*
Greyjoy.quote: "Why do you say this man is a wizard? I see only a ragged red priest." -Victarion Greyjoy to Rodrik Sparr

Greyjoy.name: Beron Blacktyde, Blind Beron
Greyjoy.descriptions:
**Beron may only Influence Greyjoy units.**
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round):*
While Influencing a friendly unit, that unit only suffers 1 Wound for every 2 unblocked Hits from any Attack or effect.
Remove Beron's Influence if that unit fails a Panic Test.
Greyjoy.quote: "ASHA! ASHA QUEEN!" - Blind Beron, in support of Asha Greyjoy at the Kingsmoot

Greyjoy.name: Asha Greyjoy, Would-be Queen
Greyjoy.descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round):*
While Influencing a friendly unit, that unit gains +1 to Morale Test rolls for each Pillage token on it.
If that unit has 2 Pillage tokens, it suffers -1 Wound from failing Panic Tests.
Greyjoy.quote: "Your choice is simple. Crown me, for peace and victory. Or crown my uncle, for more war and more defeat."
